data.name: Blast Cats
data.detailed_description:
Blast Cats is a love letter to classic 3D platformers! Bomb your enemies to smithereens and smash 'em flat with your mighty Hammer! Find precious gems as you run and jump through secret worlds. Fight powerful foes and show them who’s boss! Adventure explodes unto the world, hang in there baby!

THE STORY SO FAR

An expedition into an ancient tomb awakens a powerful wish granting genie, and all hell breaks loose! Take control of C.C, the pink cat with a knack for explosions, as she tries to undo the evil genie’s curse!

HAVE A BLAST!

Chuck Bombs at your foes and blow them to pieces! Launch devastating missile attacks with homing Fireworks!

SWING THE HAMMER DOWN!

Squash enemies flat with your trusty Hammer! Activate switches and destroy obstacles!

TEST YOUR METAL!

Scary boss monsters will keep you running! Blast those creeps before they blast you!

UNCOVER SECRET BONUS LEVELS!

Soar through the sky using your own explosions! Break the speed of sound behind the wheel of a slick rally car! Take a stroll high above the clouds! Anything can happen in these secret worlds!

Features

  • Retro Low Poly Aesthetic
  • Unique Boss Fights
  • Secret Bonus Zones
  • Jammin' Techno Soundtrack
  • Bomb Jumping!

Find precious gems as you run and jump through secret worlds. Fight powerful foes and show them who’s boss! Adventure explodes unto the world, hang in there baby!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
